title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin takes the day off so Nick Wright steps in and explains why the Patriots clearly don't trust their rookie QB Mac Jones based on what we saw when he went head to head against Tom Brady. He praises the Cowboys for their win over the previously undefeated Panthers and why this could be the best Cowboys team in a long time. He points out the big problem the Buccaneers are dealing with as they try to repeat as Super Bowl champions. Plus, 3-time Super Bowl champion Eric Mangini joins the show to tell Nick what he thought of Jones' performance and how Brady handled his return to New England.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
